title: The `version_hash` changes too often
body:
### Describe the bug

This causes errors in development and during redeployments:
```
Uncaught (in promise) ReferenceError: __sveltekit_${hash} is not defined
    at paths:2:23
```
where `${hash}` is different every time. `paths` refers to `http://localhost:5173/@id/__x00____sveltekit/paths`

Every time you run a `vite build` you'll get a different output bundle, which can result in unnecessary breakage during deployments.

### Reproduction

Start a dev server and while the dev server is running, execute a `vitest run` (or a `npx vite build`).

`[vite] page reload .svelte-kit/generated/server/internal.js`

Now the server and client are out of sync and the dev server is broken.


### Logs

```Shell
[vite] connecting...
Uncaught (in promise) ReferenceError: __sveltekit_i2dure is not defined
    at paths:2:23
[vite] connected.
```


### System Info

```Shell
System:
    OS: macOS 11.7.4
    CPU: (8) x64 Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4980HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz
    Memory: 2.05 GB / 16.00 GB
    Shell: 5.8 - /bin/zsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 19.7.0 - /usr/local/bin/node
    Yarn: 1.22.19 - ~/.yarn/bin/yarn
    npm: 9.5.0 - /usr/local/bin/npm
  Browsers:
    Chrome: 110.0.5481.177
    Chrome Canary: 113.0.5620.0
    Firefox: 110.0
    Safari: 16.3.1
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-static: ^2.0.1 => 2.0.1 
    @sveltejs/kit: ^1.8.5 => 1.8.5 
    @sveltejs/package: ^2.0.2 => 2.0.2 
    svelte: ^3.55.1 => 3.55.1 
    vite: ^4.1.4 => 4.1.4
```


### Severity

serious, but I can work around it

### Additional Information

_No response_
